channel.title: Creating Chat Logs
channel.description: Hello everyone. I'm the owner of a private server [obviously?], and I'd like to know if anyone can help me out as to making chat logs. I'd like it so every command, and everything that is typed, goes into a txt file, or something.. I'm tired of logging in my server and hearing.. "FURY FURY!?@@!? UR MODS ARE ABUSING?@!!!SHIFT+1!!" .. So I'd just like to see what they're doing when I'm not playing..

item.title: Creating Chat Logs
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

Well you could make chatlogs, or you could do it the easier way. Make a few active and trustworthy players hidden staff. Have them tell you what is going on.

Read full topic
